DC CODE ยง 46-228

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The law and procedures of the jurisdiction in which the obligor is employed shall apply, except with respect to:
When withholding must be implemented; and
The statute of limitations for maintaining an action on arrearages of support payments.

The Court shall apply the statute of limitations for maintaining an action on arrearages of support payments of either this jurisdiction or the jurisdiction that issued the support order, whichever is longer.

chapter.text: Child Support and Medical Support Enforcement. (Refs & Annos)
